title: Great experience
content: The process was easy and Everyone was very helpful and answered any questions I had. Whole process took less than a week.
author: Andrea

title: Excellent experience!
content: Cassie N. was great and very prompt in her communications with us. My husband and I wanted to refinance some credit card debt and First Midwest Bank came through for us. We weren't approved at first but when I provided more detailed income information we were quickly approved and received the money quickly. As per the loan agreement, the bank sent checks directly to a couple of creditors to ensure they were paid off and the checks arrived in less than a week. It feels really good to be able to continue on my plan to be completely debt free in 3 years! Thanks FMB & Cassie!
author: Rachel

title: Awesome experience!!
content: TeAnna made the process so easy and quick!! Great communication, via email which worked best for me.
author: Jenny

title: Best Experience I've Ever Had!!!
content: Wow!! Just funded a loan I applied for four days ago! The application process, the review process, the underwriting process and the customer service was the best I've experienced with any bank! And I couldn't find a better rate or cheaper closing costs anywhere in the country! First Midwest Bank is the real deal.Thank you Patrick, for representing the bank so well and making sure I was taken care of in a timely manner. The fantastic customer service just made the process that much easier and I will definitely be doing business with you again.
author: John

title: Excellent Service
content: My rep Christine was kind and very prompt in contacting me, kept me informed the whole time and very helpful. It was a pretty fast process takes about 3 to 4 days. They dont bombard you with a ton of requirements I would tell anyone thats looking for a loan to use First Midwest and ask for Christine Ruiz shes amazing!
author: Heidi

title: Timely communication and completion
content: Responses and direction was timely and clear. Approval was processed quickly once all information was submitted
author: Keith

title: TeAnna is AMAZING !!
content: 10 stars btwIt was my first time taking out a loan and she made it soooo easy for me. She helped me with the process and with a lot of information which wasn’t be hard to grasp. She didn't skip a beat, definitely going to keep in touch with her on my journey. Thank you
author: Gabriel

title: Personal loan
content: I highly recommend First Midwest Bank. My loan specialist, Cassie, was helpful, professional, and efficient. I can’t believe how easy and quick the loan process went. It only took one day to get approved and I received the loan within two days.
author: Shannon

title: Personal Loan
content: I worked with Morgan Johnson via email through the entire process. I contacted them for quotes, it took less than a week to get approved. I highly recommend First Midwest Bank through Lending Tree for any loan you may need. I will definitely contact them again for any other banking need. Thank you to everyone who helped me in this process. Thank you Morgan for your continue communication. Thank you!
author: Yohana

title: was simple and fast
content: Morgan went out of her way to help and answer any questions i hadwill contact them again !!!!! will recommend her to all my friends
author: debbie
